ygData.subject: Re: centaur villiage location
ygData.msgSnippet: Do they have all supplies?  As in, including arrowheads? ... From: Grant Vanderhule  To:  Sent: Thursday, June
ygData.messageBody:
Do they have all supplies? As in, including arrowheads?

----- Original Message -----
From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 10:32 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] centaur villiage location


> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> while i dont have a loc of the villiage (i never navigate that way
> anyway) try doing this to get there from the bridge: from the bridge,
> turn left and follow the coast until you pass a bunch of raiders. a bit
> past them, the coast should take a sharp turn to the south, with a tree
> inside the turn. follow this turn in the coast straight inland, and you
> should end up either at the centaur villiage or close enough that you
> can see it.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
